data.actual_result: Done button is halfway covered by the home bar, making tapping it difficult
data.expected_result: Home bar has a buffer zone with the tappable UI
data.short_description: Home bar overlaps done button on image selector (iPhone X specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap the paper clip as if you were going to upload an image - Observe the home bar in relation to the done button
